welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Falmouth, a charming coastal town known for its rich history and beautiful beaches. We hope you'll take the time to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnstable Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Barnstable Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free. Simply select the network and follow the prompts to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers luxury amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
